description: Retention of existing single storey extension, including reconstruction of gable end,  to rear of 12 Florence Road, W5 (as variation to requirement of condition 9 of planning permission ref: AJ/TPEA/40704)
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All works for making good the retained external fabric, shall be finished to match the original work with regard to the methods used and to the materials, colour, texture and profile and, in the case of the brickwork, facebond and pointing.  REASON:  To safeguard the special architectural and historic interest of the building, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, B21, B24, ES6 and H8, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 4.7, 4.8, 5.5 and 5.9.
